Create a new vhost on a VIO clustered environment

  1. List the available virtual adapters
    lshwres -r virtualio --rsubtype scsi -m ETS-9179-MHB-SN06E6B85
  2. Add a virtual adapter
    chhwres -r virtualio -m ETS-9179-MHB-SN06E6B85 -o a -p taprvio50 --rsubtype scsi -s 53 -a "adapter_type=server,remote_lpar_id=any,remote_slot_num=any"
